action.action-desc: Mr. Shimkus (for himself and Ms. DeGette) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the participation of physical therapists in the National Health Service Corps Loan Repayment Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Physical Therapist Workforce and Patient Access Act of 2015.

section.header: National Health Service Corps; participation of physical therapists in loan repayment program

subsection.header: Mission of corps; definition of primary health services
subsection.text: Section 331(a)(3)(D) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254d(a)(3)(D)) is amended by striking or mental health, and inserting mental health, or physical therapy,.
Section 338B of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254l–1) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(1), by striking and physician assistants; and inserting physician assistants, and physical therapists;; and

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting before the semicolon the following: , or have a doctoral or master's degree in physical therapy;
in subparagraph (B), by inserting physical therapy, after mental health,; and
in subparagraph (C)(ii), by inserting physical therapy, after dentistry,.
